findings.message:
Reentrancy in THORChain_Router.deposit(address,address,uint256,string) (../..0xc145990e84155416144c532e31f89b840ca8c2ce.sol#68-83):
	External calls:
	- safeAmount = safeTransferFrom(asset,amount) (../..0xc145990e84155416144c532e31f89b840ca8c2ce.sol#79)
		- (success) = _asset.call(abi.encodeWithSignature(transferFrom(address,address,uint256),msg.sender,address(this),_amount)) (../..0xc145990e84155416144c532e31f89b840ca8c2ce.sol#145)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- vaultAllowance[vault][asset] += safeAmount (../..0xc145990e84155416144c532e31f89b840ca8c2ce.sol#80)
findings.name: reentrancy-benign

findings.message:
Reentrancy in THORChain_Router.transferOut(address,address,uint256,string) (../..0xc145990e84155416144c532e31f89b840ca8c2ce.sol#100-112):
	External calls:
	- (success,None) = to.call{value: msg.value}() (../..0xc145990e84155416144c532e31f89b840ca8c2ce.sol#104)
	- (success,None) = asset.call(abi.encodeWithSignature(transfer(address,uint256),to,amount)) (../..0xc145990e84155416144c532e31f89b840ca8c2ce.sol#107)
	External calls sending eth:
	- (success,None) = to.call{value: msg.value}() (../..0xc145990e84155416144c532e31f89b840ca8c2ce.sol#104)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- TransferOut(msg.sender,to,asset,safeAmount,memo) (../..0xc145990e84155416144c532e31f89b840ca8c2ce.sol#111)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:
Reentrancy in THORChain_Router.deposit(address,address,uint256,string) (../..0xc145990e84155416144c532e31f89b840ca8c2ce.sol#68-83):
	External calls:
	- (success) = vault.call{value: safeAmount}() (../..0xc145990e84155416144c532e31f89b840ca8c2ce.sol#72)
	- iRUNE(RUNE).transferTo(address(this),amount) (../..0xc145990e84155416144c532e31f89b840ca8c2ce.sol#76)
	- iERC20(RUNE).burn(amount) (../..0xc145990e84155416144c532e31f89b840ca8c2ce.sol#77)
	- safeAmount = safeTransferFrom(asset,amount) (../..0xc145990e84155416144c532e31f89b840ca8c2ce.sol#79)
		- (success) = _asset.call(abi.encodeWithSignature(transferFrom(address,address,uint256),msg.sender,address(this),_amount)) (../..0xc145990e84155416144c532e31f89b840ca8c2ce.sol#145)
	External calls sending eth:
	- (success) = vault.call{value: safeAmount}() (../..0xc145990e84155416144c532e31f89b840ca8c2ce.sol#72)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Deposit(vault,asset,safeAmount,memo) (../..0xc145990e84155416144c532e31f89b840ca8c2ce.sol#82)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:
THORChain_Router.depositWithExpiry(address,address,uint256,string,uint256) (../..0xc145990e84155416144c532e31f89b840ca8c2ce.sol#62-65) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(block.timestamp < expiration,THORChain_Router: expired) (../..0xc145990e84155416144c532e31f89b840ca8c2ce.sol#63)
findings.name: timestamp

THORChain_Router.nonReentrant() (../..0xc145990e84155416144c532e31f89b840ca8c2ce.sol#49-54) has costly operations inside a loop:
